    A new version of the Mario Game which just contains a platform for Mario to walk left to right and a Pyramid

    1.0

    • Method Detail

      • buildPyramid

        public void buildPyramid()
        Build a pyramid of blocks. The pyramid base is twice the size, and the pyramid is size blocks high. There is a gap of 2 blocks in the centre
